title: New: A K U A – Push
body:
Rapidly rising Canadian singer **A K U A** releases her debut EP **_One’s Company_** in a few days time, and it’s sure to propel her towards popstar status.

_Push_, the newest track taken from the EP is another hit in waiting, with the immaculately unique production mixing perfectly with her stunning vocals and intricately perspective driven lyrics. Check it out below, and keep it locked for her EP, out 4 June.
